document_data.name: Catlindra Serpentar
document_data.mainbody: '''Catlindra Serpentar''' was an adventuress in [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.History:
Catlindra was born in [[Impiltur]] to a pair of merchant and lived her teenage years traveling on and around the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. Always bullied by local children, she grew strong to respond to the offenses. When finally her parents were very wealthy, they retired to a villa in [[Selgaunt]], [[Sembia]], and Catlindra was a fierce fighter who had killed many thieves.

There, however, her mother was killed and replaced by a [[doppelganger]] but Catlindra saw the deception and slew the monster in front of her father. Her father remained totally shocked and descended into a catatonic state. To do something more than care for him, Catlindra decided to finance a female-only adventuring party, the [[Company of the Catlash]].

Their first task was to eliminate a wizard near [[Haptooth]] who commanded [[undead]]. From him, she won the ''[[catlash]]'' for which the group was named. In time, Catlindra and her fellows became famous in the [[Vilhon Reach]] area.

In 1370 DR, the Company decided to go to Myth Drannor in order to acquire some magic items to empower them.
document_data.Activities: Catlindra directed the [[Company of the Catlash]].
document_data.Personality: Catlindra prided herself on being a capable leader, always maintaining a group that was strong and united. She dreamed of fighting for the liberty of the [[Dalelands]] and reclaiming or building a stronghold there, where she could talk with kings and rulers. Another dream was to be recruited by the [[Harpers]], whom she respected very much. Catlindra was always polite but cautious with strangers. She was an able judge of character and always uncovered deception.
